articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: New book to say Trump downplayed 'deadly' virus
articles.description: President Trump told reporter Bob Woodward he knew Covid-19 was deadly but wanted to avoid a panic.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Wildlife in 'catastrophic decline', report warns
articles.description: Conservation group WWF says global wildlife populations have shrunk by two-thirds since 1970.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: US university professor who posed as black resigns
articles.description: Jessica Krug, who focused on Africa and the African diaspora, had admitted in a blog she was white.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: US official claims pressure to alter intelligence
articles.description: A top intelligence official says he was ordered to downplay threats from Russia and white supremacists.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: What's behind Trump's Nobel Peace Prize nomination?
articles.description: For the second time the US president gets a nod for the coveted award - but we won't know if he wins for a year.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: 'Doomsday Glacier' vulnerability seen in new maps
articles.description: Sea and airborne surveys show how Antarctica's mighty Thwaites ice stream can be melted from below.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: This is how mind-bogglingly huge the California wildfires are
articles.description: Over two million acres of land have burned in California, compared to 118,000 acres razed in 2019.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Canada flight cancelled over child without mask
articles.description: All passengers were told to disembark the WestJet flight because a young girl was not wearing her mask.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Oscars set out best picture diversity targets
articles.description: Films that want to be nominated for the top prize must meet at least two of four new criteria.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Charity embroiled in Trudeau scandal to exit Canada
articles.description: The charity says it has to leave because of "fallout" from a political scandal involving the prime minister.
